tweets.content:
Subject: Formal Complaint â€“ Market Manipulation, Malicious Liquidations & Regulatory Breaches by @Backpack Exchange

To:
@SECGov   |  @CFTC   |  @FinCENnews   |  @FBI   |  @MAS_sg   |  @ESMAComms
Also cc: @Backpack | @Backpack_CN | @armaniferrante

Complainant: Joe shao ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸   Email: jwfv4n@163.com
Date: October 19, 2025

â¸»

Summary

This complaint concerns @Backpack, operated by @armaniferrante (backpack.app), for its October 11 2025 mass liquidations that allegedly wiped usersâ€”even neutral hedged positionsâ€”through manipulated internal pricing and defective risk controls.
Multiple users (notably @river_bluffer threads) document severe losses and non-transparent liquidation logic, suggesting market manipulation, operational negligence, and regulatory non-compliance.

â¸»

Key Allegations
1.Manipulated Liquidation Prices
Internal spot quotes deviated 20â€“24%, causing margin calls on positions neutral to the broader market. Users lost up to â€“$39 000 on hedged trades.
â†’ Possible SEC Rule 10b-5 / CEA 6(c)(1) violations.
2.ADL & Risk-Control Failures
ADL closed only derivative legs, leaving spot exposure. â€œSafe hedgeâ€ marketing misled users; insurance funds not applied.
â†’ Misrepresentation / fraudulent inducement.
3.Liquidity Shortfalls & Artificial Wicks
Empty order books on BTC/SOL pairs; no market-maker backup or circuit-breaker.
â†’ Potential CEA 9(a) artificial-price creation.
4.Refusal to Compensate & Opaque Fees
Support tickets closed; â€œKFC promotionâ€ mocked users. Liquidation fees raised 0.5%â†’1% without notice or refund.
â†’ Violates CFTC Reg. 1.55 / 17 CFR 166.3 (transparency & fair dealing).

â¸»

Evidence (available on request)
â€¢Public threads by @river_bluffer show price gaps and user losses.
â€¢Screenshots: liquidation times, margin ratios, TX hashes, support IDs.
â€¢Archived ToS (Oct 2025) lacks multi-venue index or circuit breaker clauses.
â€¢@Backpack posts advertising EU/US availability contradict jurisdiction claims.

â¸»

Requested Actions
1.Investigate pricing, liquidation, and risk systems of @Backpack.
2.Assess offering of unregistered derivatives to US/EU/SG users.
3.Order restitution and publish investor alerts if violations confirmed.
4.Coordinate cross-border enforcement among @MAS_sg and @ESMAComms.

â¸»

Reporter Details

Joe shao  |  United States  |  Email jwfv4n@163.com
Willing to submit complete records and sworn statement upon request.

Sincerely,
Joe shao
October 19, 2025
